name: yuri doujin
description: A heartwarming tale of love between girls. It assumes the reader is already familiar with the characters, so it can get right into making them kiss. Read from right to left.

name: hentai doujin
description: Low-grade graphical smut. Most of the enjoyment is in the absurd dialogue.

name: kinky doujin
description: A rare gem of graphical smut, featuring all the good kinks and none of the bad kinks. What every lewd doujin should be, in your opinion.

name: The Heart of War
description: The famous book by Sun Tsun, with annotations on how to apply its advice in modern times. These tips also illustrate the essentials of Wife-Fu.

name: stone tablet of knock-knock jokes
description: Lowbrow humor from ancient Samothrace. Surprisingly funny, if you're the sort of person that knows how to read dead languages.

name: Maid in Heaven
description: A reference guide by and for maids of a certain persuasion. While originally intended for more-or-less leisurely pursuits, it might give you some more practical ideas as well.

name: Necaux Labs Catalog
description: A mail-order catalog for Necaux Labs' products. This one is the swimsuit edition.
